text: Maciej Pilitowski (born 27 October 1990) is a Polish handball player for Energa MKS Kalisz and the Polish national team. ==Career== ===National team=== Pilitowski made his debut for the national team on 4 January 2013, in a friendly match against Hungary (27:29). He was also chosen to participate at the 2014 European Championship in Denmark, but failed to make it to the final squad. He represented Poland at the 2020 European Men's Handball Championship.2020 European Men's Handball Championship squad ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ciechanów Category:Polish male handball players
title: Maciej Pilitowski
